entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Safety Note+ Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

Introducing Safety Note+: Keep Your Most Private Notes Secure Have you ever experienced the frustration of lending someone your phone, only to have them intrude on your personal information? We understand the discomfort that comes with it. That's why we created Safety Note+. With this powerful app, you can now safeguard your private notes from unauthorized access effortlessly. Key Features: ‚Ä¢ Advanced security system: Utilizing state-of-the-art technology to protect your notes ‚Ä¢ Passcode protection: Quickly and easily secure your most private and sensitive notes with a passcode only known to you ‚Ä¢ Biometric support: Unlock the app using TouchID or FaceID for added convenience ‚Ä¢ Intruder report: Capture photos of unauthorized individuals attempting to access your app ‚Ä¢ Decoy password: Conceal your real privacy with a decoy password ‚Ä¢ Folder-specific passcode locking: Enhance security by applying passcode protection to individual folders ‚Ä¢ Dot pattern lock style: Opt for a higher level of security with the dot pattern lock style ‚Ä¢ Multiple lock designs: Choose from three stylish and user-friendly lock designs without compromising security ‚Ä¢ Intuitive interface: Selectable themes and an easy-to-use interface make managing your notes a breeze ‚Ä¢ Note organization: Create, sort, move, and copy notes within folders ‚Ä¢ Backup and sharing options: Back up notes to your computer via iTunes file sharing or iCloud, and share notes between iOS devices with Safety Note+ installed via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi ‚Ä¢ Additional features: Auto-save, note search, email notes, and full orientation support ‚Ä¢ Universal compatibility: Developed for both iPhone and iPad, requiring a single purchase Your privacy matters. With Safety Note+, you can confidently secure your personal information. Customize your passcode style, protect individual folders, and experience the peace of mind that comes with complete control over your private notes. Download Safety Note+ now and ensure that what goes into Safety Note+ remains for your eyes only. Visit us at: Website: https://sixbytes.io Twitter: https://twitter.com/SixbytesApp Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sixbytesapp For more information, please refer to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: Terms of service: https://sixbytes.io/assets/terms-of-service.pdf Privacy policy: https://sixbytes.io/assets/privacy-policy.pdf

entry.title: BreatheIn: Calm Breathing
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.59 Ôºâ

Application Description

Elevate Your Life with BreatheIn! Ever feel lost in the chaos of life? Ever wish for a moment of peace and tranquility? Dive deep into the transformative power of breath with BreatheIn! Unlock Calmness and Vitality! Breathing deeply, slowly, and regularly is the secret key to a serene mind and a vibrant life! Immerse yourself in the rhythm of your breath, and experience the joy of being truly alive. Unify your mind and body through empowering breathing exercises and embark on a journey of self-discovery and renewal! Curated and Tested Practices Just For You! At BreatheIn, we've meticulously selected and personally validated every breathing exercise to ensure you receive only the best. Embrace a healthier and more fulfilling life by joining us in exploring these transformative practices! Seamless Integration with Apple Health! Track your progress effortlessly! Your mindful minutes with BreatheIn are automatically added to Apple Health, making it easier than ever to monitor your wellness journey. Discover a Variety of Breathing Exercises! - Square Breathing (4-4-4-4): A simple yet powerful technique to regain control and alleviate stress. - Relax Breathing (4-7-8): A tranquilizing method to quell anxiety and drift into sleep swiftly. - Bhramari Pranayama (Bee Breathing): A harmonizing technique to soothe the mind and relax the body. - Coherent Breathing: Aimed at enhancing Heart Rate Variability (HRV) for optimal well-being. Transform Your Life One Breath at a Time! Every exercise is a stepping stone towards a more balanced and resilient self. Conquer stress, rejuvenate your body, and find your center with BreatheIn! Start Your Journey Today! Download BreatheIn and step into a world of peace, balance, and vitality. Every breath you take is a step towards a more vibrant you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Juice Watch
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

Monitor your iPhone battery level from your wrist. Juice Watch is a simple app designed to do two things well: ‚Ä¢ Show the battery level of the paired iPhone in a complication on Apple Watch ‚Ä¢ Deliver a notification on your iPhone when your Apple Watch is charging and gets above 90% (or whatever level you choose, from 50% to 100%) Just glance at your wrist to monitor the charge of your iPhone throughout the day. Or, keep tabs on the battery level of your iPhone while it is plugged in and charging in another room. You can see both your iPhone and Apple Watch battery levels on the same complication. You can also get a notification on your Apple Watch when the paired iPhone is charging and reaches at least 80% (or whatever level you choose, from 50% to 100%). You can set up low battery notifications, to get notifications when your Apple Watch or iPhone battery is low. Juice Watch is available for a wide variety of complications, so you can use it on your favorite watch faces. You can also use this app to check your Apple Watch battery level from your paired iPhone. This can be useful while your Apple Watch is charging somewhere else. Keep in mind that the iPhone battery level shown on Apple Watch is not real-time. It is refreshed periodically, about every 5‚Äì60 minutes. The Apple Watch battery level shown on the paired iPhone refreshes at approximately the same rate. As of iOS 17 and watchOS 10, Juice Watch reports battery levels rounded to the nearest 5% since that's now the granularity that Apple makes available to apps.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Application Description

Weather radar in your pocket everywhere. Use Rain Radar to quickly see an animated radar image and current conditions. Track the movement of downpours, weather fronts and storms using the zoomable rain radar function. ‚ÄúRain Radar" forecasts for any location worldwide and displays real-time weather conditions as well as emerging patterns. Everything about the weather at a glance. Fast, simple and free of charge! A weather forecast app that accurately depicts current weather and emerging patterns.
